info.desc: Mark up general identifiers found on computer system.

item.p: The style attribute takes a space-separated list of style hints. Processing tools should adjust their rendering according to those style hints they understand.
The sys element can link to other pages or documents. See for more information.
The sys element can have attributes from external namespaces. See for more information on external-namespace attributes on inline elements.

section.title: Comparison to DocBook
section.p: The sys element is similar to the systemitem element in DocBook. DocBook has gained numerous elements which were once marked using the class attribute on the systemitem element. Since Mallard does not provide the level of markup specificity that DocBook does, the sys element should be used in place of these and various other elements.
